languages.text: "Конечно же, нет. Меня ждет мой кабал". {n}Маражай устремляет взгляд куда-то мимо вас.{/n} "Опустошительная буря, огрызнувшаяся на Черное сердце... меня и моих подданных ждет интересное будущее. Возможно, нас раздавят. Возможно, нас будут бояться. Как бы то ни было..." {n}Друкари смотрит на вас.{/n} "Это — та жизнь, ради которой я был рожден".

"Of course not. My Kabal is waiting for me." {n}Marazhai stares past you into the middle distance.{/n} "The Reaving Tempest that tore a piece out of the Black Heart... An interesting future awaits me and my subjects. Perhaps we will be crushed. Perhaps we will be feared. Whatever happens..." {n}He looks at you.{/n} "It is the life I was born to live."

Возможно, нас раздавят. Возможно, нас будут бояться. Как бы то ни было..." {n}Друкари смотрит на вас.{/n} "Это — та жизнь, ради которой я был рожден".

An interesting future awaits me and my subjects. Perhaps we will be crushed. Perhaps we will be feared. Whatever happens..." {n}He looks at you.{/n} "It is the life I was born to live."

languages.text: 「まさか。陰謀団が俺を待ってるからな」{n}マラズハイはあなたの向こう、どこか遠くを見つめていた。{/n}「略奪の嵐は黒き心臓を散り散りにさせた…俺や仲間には面白い運命が待ち受けている。もしかすると追われる立場になるかもしれない。もしかすると恐れられるかもしれない。いずれにせよ…」{n}彼はこちらを見た。{/n}「それが俺様の宿命だよ」
languages.original_text: "Of course not. My Kabal is waiting for me." {n}Marazhai stares past you into the middle distance.{/n} "The Reaving Tempest that tore a piece out of the Black Heart... An interesting future awaits me and my subjects. Perhaps we will be crushed. Perhaps we will be feared. Whatever happens..." {n}He looks at you.{/n} "It is the life I was born to live."

traits.locale_text: 「まさか。陰謀団が俺を待ってるからな」{n}マラズハイはあなたの向こう、どこか遠くを見つめていた。{/n}「略奪の嵐は黒き心臓を散り散りにさせた…俺や仲間には面白い運命が待ち受けている。もしかすると追われる立場になるかもしれない。もしかすると恐れられるかもしれない。いずれにせよ…」{n}彼はこちらを見た。{/n}「それが俺様の宿命だよ」

languages.text: “当然不会了，我的阴谋团还在等着我。”{n}玛拉斋的目光越过你，望向远方。{/n}“狂风阴谋团，撕下了黑心阴谋团的一角……未来还有更多有趣的事情在等着我和我的部下。或许我们会被消灭，或许我们将成为主宰。但无论如何……”{n}他转而看着你。{/n}“这就是我命中注定的道路。”
languages.original_text: "Of course not. My Kabal is waiting for me." {n}Marazhai stares past you into the middle distance.{/n} "The Reaving Tempest that tore a piece out of the Black Heart... An interesting future awaits me and my subjects. Perhaps we will be crushed. Perhaps we will be feared. Whatever happens..." {n}He looks at you.{/n} "It is the life I was born to live."

traits.locale_text: “当然不会了，我的阴谋团还在等着我。”{n}玛拉斋的目光越过你，望向远方。{/n}“狂风阴谋团，撕下了黑心阴谋团的一角……未来还有更多有趣的事情在等着我和我的部下。或许我们会被消灭，或许我们将成为主宰。但无论如何……”{n}他转而看着你。{/n}“这就是我命中注定的道路。”

languages.text: "Natürlich nicht. Meine Kabale wartet auf mich." {n}Marazhai starrt an dir vorbei in die Ferne.{/n} "Der plündernde Sturm, der ein Stück aus dem schwarzen Herzen gerissen hat ... Eine interessante Zukunft erwartet mich und meine Untertanen. Vielleicht werden wir zerquetscht. Vielleicht werden wir gefürchtet. Was auch geschieht"{n}, er blickt dich an,{/n} "das ist das Leben, für das ich geboren wurde."
languages.original_text: "Of course not. My Kabal is waiting for me." {n}Marazhai stares past you into the middle distance.{/n} "The Reaving Tempest that tore a piece out of the Black Heart... An interesting future awaits me and my subjects. Perhaps we will be crushed. Perhaps we will be feared. Whatever happens..." {n}He looks at you.{/n} "It is the life I was born to live."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich nicht. Meine Kabale wartet auf mich." {n}Marazhai starrt an dir vorbei in die Ferne.{/n} "Der plündernde Sturm, der ein Stück aus dem schwarzen Herzen gerissen hat ... Eine interessante Zukunft erwartet mich und meine Untertanen. Vielleicht werden wir zerquetscht. Vielleicht werden wir gefürchtet. Was auch geschieht"{n}, er blickt dich an,{/n} "das ist das Leben, für das ich geboren wurde."

languages.text: «Claro que no. Mi Kábala me espera». {n}Marazhai mira a la distancia, como si no estuvieras.{/n} «La Tempestad Asoladora le ha arrancado un trozo al Corazón Negro... A mis súbditos y a mí nos esperan tiempos interesantes. Tal vez nos aplasten. Tal vez nos impongamos. Pase lo que pase...». {n}Te mira.{/n} «He nacido para esto».
languages.original_text: "Of course not. My Kabal is waiting for me." {n}Marazhai stares past you into the middle distance.{/n} "The Reaving Tempest that tore a piece out of the Black Heart... An interesting future awaits me and my subjects. Perhaps we will be crushed. Perhaps we will be feared. Whatever happens..." {n}He looks at you.{/n} "It is the life I was born to live."

traits.locale_text: «Claro que no. Mi Kábala me espera». {n}Marazhai mira a la distancia, como si no estuvieras.{/n} «La Tempestad Asoladora le ha arrancado un trozo al Corazón Negro... A mis súbditos y a mí nos esperan tiempos interesantes. Tal vez nos aplasten. Tal vez nos impongamos. Pase lo que pase...». {n}Te mira.{/n} «He nacido para esto».

languages.text: « Bien sûr que non. Ma Kabale m'attend, {n}répond-il, puis son regard se perd dans le lointain.{/n} La Tempête ravageuse qui a arraché un morceau du Cœur Noir... Un avenir incertain nous attend, moi et mes sujets. Peut-être serons-nous anéantis. Peut-être serons-nous craints. Quoi qu'il arrive... telle est la vie à laquelle je suis destiné, » {n}termine-t-il en vous regardant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course not. My Kabal is waiting for me." {n}Marazhai stares past you into the middle distance.{/n} "The Reaving Tempest that tore a piece out of the Black Heart... An interesting future awaits me and my subjects. Perhaps we will be crushed. Perhaps we will be feared. Whatever happens..." {n}He looks at you.{/n} "It is the life I was born to live."

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr que non. Ma Kabale m'attend, {n}répond-il, puis son regard se perd dans le lointain.{/n} La Tempête ravageuse qui a arraché un morceau du Cœur Noir... Un avenir incertain nous attend, moi et mes sujets. Peut-être serons-nous anéantis. Peut-être serons-nous craints. Quoi qu'il arrive... telle est la vie à laquelle je suis destiné, » {n}termine-t-il en vous regardant.{/n}

languages.text: "Tabii ki hayır. Kabalım beni bekliyor." {n}Marazhai, gözlerini arkanda bir yerlere doğru dikiyor.{/n} "Kara Yürek'in bir parçasını söküp alan Müfteris Kasırga... Beni ve tebaamı enteresan bir gelecek bekliyor. Belki ayaklar altına alınırız. Belki korkulan bir topluluk hâline geliriz. Ne olursa olsun..." {n}Sana bakıyor.{/n} "Benim doğduğum ve içinde yaşadığım hayat bu."
languages.original_text: "Of course not. My Kabal is waiting for me." {n}Marazhai stares past you into the middle distance.{/n} "The Reaving Tempest that tore a piece out of the Black Heart... An interesting future awaits me and my subjects. Perhaps we will be crushed. Perhaps we will be feared. Whatever happens..." {n}He looks at you.{/n} "It is the life I was born to live."
